DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Warranty on quality performance of contract (5.00 %)

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: Payment terms: payment after submission invoice within 60 days

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Statement of the economical operator that in the past five years there has not been adjudged an effective verdict for participating in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering.
Confirmation that there is not an open procedure for bankruptcy by a competent authority.
Confirmation that there is not an open procedure for liquidation by a competent authority.
Confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public expenditures by a competent authority from the state where the economical operator is registered.

Confirmation from the Register for penalties for criminal acts of the public entities that there aren’t imposed minor fines, prohibition for participating in procedures for public call, granting contracts for public procurement and contracts for public-private partnership.
Confirmation from the Register for penalties for criminal acts of the public entities that there aren’t imposed minor fines, temporary or permanent prohibition for performing certain activity.

Confirmation that there isn’t adjudged a penalty for violation with a legally-binding verdict – prohibition for performing the professional activities and duties, respectively a temporary prohibition for performing certain activity.
Ability of the economical operator for performing professional activity:
— DRD Sample or confirmation for registered activity,
Of medical devices pursuant to the Law on medical products and medical devices.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — Decision for placing the medical products on the market or temporary or permanent solution for parallel import, pursuant to the law on medical products and medical devices.
— Permit for import (authorization for interventional import) pursuant to the Law on Medical Products and Medical Devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Electronic auction will be held as a final stage in this procurement process

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Health care center "Pance Karagjozov" ul Hristijan Karposh"bb-2 Floor Archive 2000 Shtip

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Additional informations about autorised persons and opening the procedure — All bidders must bring a letter of authorization so that can be present and also so they can state remarks at the opening of the tender.
